医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
独特的植物提取物混合物具有有效的抗痤疮功效研究人员通过抗菌评估和体外分析评估了 FRO（一种由发酵漆树和山竹组成的配方）对抗痤疮发病机制的功效。 FRO被发现含有没食子酸、非瑟酮、槲皮素和山奈酚等酚类物质，并被确定可以通过抑制痤疮皮肤杆菌的生长、炎症和过多的皮脂来缓解痤疮。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230709/Unique-plant-extract-mixture-has-pot-anti-acne-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230709/Unique-plant-extract-mixture-has-pot-anti-acne-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3daca1ef-f446-4cba-bebc-3a40781c2081 Sun, 09 Jul 2023 00:24:00 -0400 Unique plant extract mixture has potent anti-acne effects
欢呼还是谨慎？研究人员质疑饮酒的潜在好处研究论文讨论了饮酒与健康之间的关系，特别是 J 形关联。虽然一些研究表明存在这种关系，但最近的研究由于研究设计和个体差异的限制而对其提出了挑战。该文件还强调了考虑替代性健康促进策略以及饮酒对社会/人口水平有害影响的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230709/Cheers-or-caution-Researchers-question-the-pottial-benefits-of-alcohol-conspiration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230709/Cheers-or-caution-Researchers-question-the-pottial-benefits-of-alcohol-conspiration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f76251a9-dfbf-4489-b85d-2cc233299f45 Sun, 09 Jul 2023 00:17:00 -0400 Cheers or caution? Researchers question the potential benefits of alcohol consumption
澳大利亚雨林疗法：科学家探索生物活性植物化合物作为潜在的抗神经炎症剂研究讨论了从澳大利亚雨林中发现的药用植物中发现抗炎和神经保护药物的过程。它使用当前研究中的一些例子，重点介绍从发现生物活性植物到在适当的神经炎症小鼠模型中进行验证的途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230709/Australian-rainforest-remedies-Scientists-explore-bioactive-plant-compounds-as-潜在-抗神经炎症-agents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230709/Australian-rainforest-remedies-Scientists-explore-bioactive-plant-compounds-as-潜在-抗神经炎症-agents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=836747ab-b025-4a0c-bf25-ed736a123143 Sun, 09 Jul 2023 00:02:00 -0400 Australian rainforest remedies: Scientists explore bioactive plant compounds as potential anti-neuroinflammatory agents
新计划为年轻阿尔茨海默氏症患者提供远足探险活动从今年 7 月开始，65 岁之前被诊断出患有阿尔茨海默氏症的人将有一个新的机会通过名为 SOAR 的计划与他人联系，同时探索精彩的户外活动。该名称是 Shared Outdoor Adventures for Resilience 的缩写。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/New-program-offers-hiking-adventures-for-people-with-younger-onset-Alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/New-program-offers-hiking-adventures-for-people-with-younger-onset-Alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b669cae-e0d9-4e46-afae-c3918f419d1d Fri, 07 Jul 2023 21:24:00 -0400 New program offers hiking adventures for people with younger-onset Alzheimer's
双侧全膝关节置换术可能会增加并发症的风险《骨与关节外科杂志》上的一项研究报告称，与接受单侧全膝关节置换术的匹配患者相比，接受双侧全膝关节置换术 (TKA) 的患者出现多种并发症的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Bilingual-total-knee-arthroplasty-may-increase-risk-of-complications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Bilingual-total-knee-arthroplasty-may-increase-risk-of-complications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=295ed44d-4ced-4409-839a-4b7b6e8abbc9 Fri, 07 Jul 2023 21:18:00 -0400 Bilateral total knee arthroplasty may increase risk of complications
研究揭示深度睡眠与血糖控制之间的联系机制研究人员已经知道，缺乏高质量的睡眠会增加一个人患糖尿病的风险。然而，原因仍然是个谜。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Research-uncovers-mechanism-linking-deep-sleep-to-blood-sugar-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Research-uncovers-mechanism-linking-deep-sleep-to-blood-sugar-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=473a1b6a-5002-472b-860c-08781ae8db8c Fri, 07 Jul 2023 21:14:00 -0400 Research uncovers mechanism linking deep sleep to blood sugar control
研究追踪人类癌症最早阶段的自然演变斯坦福大学医学院的研究人员发现，未来的癌细胞在被识别为恶性肿瘤前的数年里，会以可预测的、连续的方式积累一系列特定的基因变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Study-traces-the-natural-evolution-of-earliest-stages-of- human-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Study-traces-the-natural-evolution-of-earliest-stages-of- human-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a1f6952-1039-4235-bf01-57546da659eb Fri, 07 Jul 2023 21:07:00 -0400 Study traces the natural evolution of earliest stages of human cancers
AML患者新型染色体异常的病例报告及综述2023 年 6 月 28 日，《Genes & Cancer》发表了一篇新的研究论文，题为“A new t (5; 17) (q35; q21) related to t (8; 21) (q22; q22) in a Patient of Acute粒细胞白血病：病例报告和文献综述。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Case-report-and-review-of-a-novel-chromosomal-abnormality-in-AML-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Case-report-and-review-of-a-novel-chromosomal-abnormality-in-AML-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d385615-90f7-4ed4-9741-6cd05dd8c2d5 Fri, 07 Jul 2023 20:52:00 -0400 Case report and review of a novel chromosomal abnormality in AML patient
经济毒性是晚期前列腺癌患者的主要问题根据美国泌尿外科协会 (AUA) 官方期刊 The Journal of Urology® 8 月号的一项研究，50% 的转移性前列腺癌患者因治疗而经历一定程度的经济困难。该期刊由威科集团 (Wolters Kluwer) 的 Lippincott 作品集出版。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Financial-毒性-a-major-issue-for-病人-with-advanced-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Financial-毒性-a-major-issue-for-病人-with-advanced-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=913ed0f9-126b-49a9-8e74-a0f407e4fc32 Fri, 07 Jul 2023 20:48:00 -0400 Financial toxicity a major issue for patients with advanced prostate cancer
研究人员识别并描述了拟南芥芽再生的关键负调节因子植物具有完全由体细胞（即通常不参与繁殖的普通细胞）再生的独特能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Researchers-identify-and-characterize-a-key-negative-regulator-of-shoot-regenesis-in-Arabidopsis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230707/Researchers-identify-and-characterize-a-key-negative-regulator-of-shoot-regenesis-in-Arabidopsis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2df78b3-38ba-41fe-ad55-aa38fde0442a Fri, 07 Jul 2023 20:41:00 -0400 Researchers identify and characterize a key negative regulator of shoot regeneration in Arabidopsis
